channel.title: Documentation :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: The next step in writing good code is adding proper documentation and comments to describe the code and what it does. By writing good documentation, we can pass on helpful information to other developers who need to maintain this code, including our future selves! Javadoc The Java platform includes a tool called Javadoc that can be used to generate documentation directly from the comments in a piece of source code. A great example that we already explored in the textbook is the entire Java API Documentation, which is generated directly from the Java source code using Javadoc. For instance, you can compare the comments at the top of the ArrayList source code file:
